long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is very common for the tasks to be performed to be communicated through a web page. And it is also very common to use plain text files to avoid losing focus on the tasks to be performed. With this extension you can add a button to any website using a regular expression. With this button and the power of [Tasker](https://github.com/atareao/tasker) no task will escape.
